name: Air_Gills_DX
description: The Air Gills DX is a respirator mask made for arid environment. It possesses a pair of filtres with dirty white and dark grey cartridges, separated by a yellow safety label. The front consists of a black valve, the facemask itself and two black toggles for adjusting the strap, adorned with a SquidForce logo pattern, which's ends connect to a gum headband. The bottom of the mask has yet another strap going around the wearer's nape. The bottom part of the filtres and the facemask change the colour to match the wearer's ink.

name: Bucket_Hat
description: The Bucket Hat is a solid-colored bucket hat that changes color with the wearer's ink. On the front is a white logo and on the left is a red tag with white lettering.

name: Painter's_Mask
description: The Painter's Mask is a dual-filter respirator. It is held onto the head with an elastic band that changes color to one similar to the opposing team's ink. The filters are yellow.

name: Squid_Facemask
description: The Squid Facemask is a black cloth mask that covers the wearer's nose and mouth and hooks over the ears. It is patterned with many small Regular Battle logos in white and bright yellow.

name: White_Headband
description: The White Headband is white with a thick gray stripe through the middle, ending in an arrow on one end and three short "tentacles" on the other. On the front towards the wearer's left side is Squidforce's name in white Inkling text. In between the start and end of the gray stripe is a small, bright pink tag with Squidforce's name again in white.
